name: sastraining
body:
### Welcome to the Real Solution Analytics github training site 

##About RSA SAS Training Course 

This SAS training course will help you in understanding the domains of business analytics and business intelligence. Upon completion of the course you will have enough proficiency in reading spreadsheets, databases, use SAS functions for manipulating this data and debugging it. This training also includes data mining, modeling techniques, visualization of data, predictive analysis and extracting insights.

##What you will learn in this training ? 

Learn the SAS environment and various windows
Understand the SAS Enterprise Guide
Study the logical statements, operators and functions
Create datasets and deploy Compilation and Execution
Understand SAS graphs and summary reports
Get to know Advanced SAS Base
Course Completion Certificate from Intellipaat
Be prepared for BASE SAS Professional Certificatio

##What are the Prerequisites For learning SAS ?

Anybody can learn SAS and get trained. Having a basic knowledge of SQL can help.

##Who should Take This SAS Training Course ?

Business Intelligence professionals
Software developers and architects
Project managers
ETL, SQL, data warehouse and analytics professionals
Mainframe and testing professionals
Graduates wanting to enter Big Data analytics
